rules.description: Map CAPSLOCK to CONTROL on hold, and to ESCAPE on tap
Terminal: Map CONTROL+[ to ESCAPE everywhere except terminal apps
Zoom: Mute & unmute using the Dictation key (F5) (remember to enable global shortcut for `Mute/Unmute My Audio` in Zoom's Settings)
Chromium: Focus on the address bar with COMMAND+O
Chromium: Copy URL in the address bar with COMMAND+Y
Chromium: Accept suggestion & go with CONTROL+F
Chromium: Move tab left/right (or up/down) with COMMAND+[/]
Chromium: Undo close tab with COMMAND+U
Chromium: Switch to last used tab with COMMAND+` (requires CLUT extension)
Notes: COMMAND+F to search all notes
Notes: COMMAND+SHIFT+F to search within a note
Notes: COMMAND+N/P to go to next/previous note
